name: Speed Farmer
description:
Controls:

WASD to move

1 for shovel: Used to harvest and to dig farm plots

2 for the watering can: Used to water plants. You can fill it by going to the well

3 for fertilizer bag: Used to feed plants. You can fill it by going to the fertilizer pile

4 for your seeds: Used to plant seeds

SPACE for all interactions (Planting, Shoveling, Talking, etc.)

Hints**

-Hover on planted plants for their information

-You have to feed and water plants for them to grow there is no timer

-You can buy more seeds from shopkeepers around the map

-There are secrets located around the whole world!
